Reviews.Title: “Quaint hotel, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: WFD0328
Reviews.Content: We stay at the Hotel du Rond Point des Champs Elysees whenever we visit Paris. We love it! The rooms are very nice, the location is fantastic, and the front desk staff is the same now as it was when we first stayed there in 1996! The hotel is one block from the Champs Elysees at the mid point between the Jardin des Tuilleries and the Arc de Triumphe. There are numerous cafes all within one block of the hotel, and the boulangerie/patisserie two doors down sends the wonderful aroma of fresh baked bread past your window in the morning. The hotel offers breakfast but it's expensive. If you want a good and reasonably priced breakfast, go out the front door of the hotel, cross the street and head to the left. There is a great little cafe right there on the corner that has a very good breakfast and the coffee is perfect! Most of the hotel rooms at the Rond-Point are for two but they do have at least one "family suite", which has a queen-size bed, a sofa bed that sleeps two, and two bathrooms. They also have two rooms that have a terrace with an incredible view of the eiffel tower. The Champs Elysees is one block away, and for high-end shopping, Avenue Montaigne is just two blocks away on the other side of the Champs Elysees. There you'll find Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Prada, etc. If you're looking for that small French hotel experience convenient to the usual tourist sites, transportation and great shopping, you absolutely cannot go wrong with this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect taste of Paris!”
Reviews.Author: Softsoutherner
Reviews.Content: 2nd time we have stayed here. Liked it before, but love it now. Near everything. The place is small, artsy, and has a lot of chracter. If you want the Hilton, this isn't for you. But if you want to enjoy Paris like it is meant to be, this is the place for you. And, if you've heard bad things about the Parisiennes, forget it when you stay here. Everyone at the hotel was helpful and charming. They will appreciate what little French you speak, but all speak excellent English. We took the Metro a couple of times, but mainly enjoyed walking evrywhere. Rooms vary in size. This time we stayed in #80 - one floor up from the last elevator stop so we had stairs even with our huge suitcases. But no one seemed to mind. Our room might have even been the smallest, but it was like living above the city. View of the tower just outside our door, and Paris rooftops from our bed. Meticulously clean and beautifully decorated. Breakfast was perfect, though there are many little places near to have coffee and pastry in the morning.

Reviews.Title: “Genuine Parisian Hotel”
Reviews.Author: vanlipp
Reviews.Content: This quaint, interesting little hotel immediately makes one feel that you are truely in Paris. It's decor speaks of olde world charm; simply elegant without ostentation. Our room was very comfortable and the bathroom fabulously spacious. Cleaning of the room was done perfectly every day and fresh, fluffy white towels were awaiting us on our return. The staff were all very cordial, friendly and most accommodating. The breakfasts were lovely, especially because of the setting in the beautifully furnished dining room and the splendid crockery on which it was served. Our five day stay in Paris was made more special because of the 'Hotel du Rond Point' and was a home away from home. It's location, one street below the Champs Elysees, is perfectly situated. It's a peaceful, welcoming place to return to each day.

Reviews.Title: “A nice and warming hotel”
Reviews.Author: dumora75
Reviews.Content: The reception are very nich, except one tall guy. The room is big with a small balcony. I didn't have chance to enjoy their breakfast, so, cannot give any commend about it. In general, it is a nice hotel with best location. Just few minutes walk to the Metro and Champs Elysees.

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: ROUROUX
Reviews.Content: it was very nice and cosy, a wonderful and comfortable double room!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible - this hotel has fleas”
Reviews.Author: zerotraveller182
Reviews.Content: This hotel is the worst hotel I have ever been to. I have travelled all over the world and stayed at many hotels. The hotel room has fleas and I was bitten all over my body by fleas. The owner was also very rude and denied that I was attacked by fleas despite flea bites all over my body and the local pharmacy telling me I was bitten by fleas. Furthermore, the owner offered no apology whatsoever. DO NOT STAY HERE!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great choice!”
Reviews.Author: Rica_Fe
Reviews.Content: We loved the Hotel du Rond Point: great location, 1 block from Champs Elysees. We liked the breakfast buffet, the rooms (superior room), and the service that was amazingly friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Old Paris Charm”
Reviews.Author: Zwenn
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with a colleague during a work trip over a hot weekend in July. The rooms ooze the classy but stuffy charm of Vieux Paris. The lack of air condidtioning was not balanced off by the seemingly modern but noisy fan in my room. Sleeping in room 17, just above the kitchen, turned out to be a problem when kitchen staff started its noisy work at 6.30 am: the open kitchen windows led into a small internal court where every sound was reflected from the walls into residents' rooms. Reception staff was friendly enough, while service over breakfast was slow and unattentive. Though pretending to be continental, breakfast was little more than a brushed up version of coffee and croissant. All in all, disappointing for the price we paid.

Reviews.Title: “worst hotel in paris”
Reviews.Author: marksartworld
Reviews.Content: Hotel management does not respond to problems does not respond to emails, never returned emails does not help in return of personal property do not recommend staying a this hotel ever.

Reviews.Title: “Best value for money for great location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Great location and personalized service. I go to Paris at least 6 times a year and have made this hotel my regular port of call. In the 15 years I have travelled regularly to Paris, I have not yet found a place that offers the same location, great service and nice clean functional rooms like this at a price that is not a complete robbery. Highly recommendable.

Reviews.Title: “Just Average”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Wife & I stayed here 2 nights from 11/3/5 - 13/3/5 & paid E140 per night room only. Price was for the location (which was excellant, just of Champs Elysees) as room was small & basic. We stayed on the 2nd floor, just as well as the lift was tiny! No bar in hotel nor kettle in room. Staff pleasant & courteous. Lots of places to eat closeby of variable price/quality. Lots of shops within steps but all hugely expensive with no customers. Beer extremely expensive as were spirits. Would return again for the location.

Reviews.Title: “Warm staff and surroundings at Hotel Du Rond-Point”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel Du Rond-Point offers a great location next to the Champs-Elysees, along with a gracious staff and warm,comfortable accomodations. I am an experienced world traveler, and plan to return there on my next trip to Paris. EE Jones

HotelInfo.Name: Rond-Point Hotel Champs-Elysees
HotelInfo.Address: 10, rue de Ponthieu, 75008 Paris, France
